search.placeholder: Search snippets by title, language, or content...

emptyState.title: No snippets yet
emptyState.description: Start building your code snippet library. Save reusable code for quick access anytime.

selectionControls.moveToAria: Move selected snippets to another namespace

snippetCard.alreadyInNamespace: Snippet is already in this namespace

create.title: Create New Snippet
create.description: Save a reusable code snippet for quick access later.

edit.title: Edit Snippet
edit.description: Update your code snippet details below.

preview.label: Enable split-screen preview for this snippet

create.title: Create Namespace
create.description: Create a new namespace to organize your snippets

delete.title: Delete Namespace
delete.body: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? All snippets will be moved to the default namespace.

selector.noDefault: Cannot delete: no default namespace found
selector.deletedWithMoved: Namespace deleted — {count} snippet(s) moved to default

pythonTerminal.title: Python Terminal
pythonTerminal.emptyState: Click "Run" to execute the Python code

statusAlerts.title: App status
statusAlerts.localModeDesc: Running in local-first mode so you can work offline without a backend.
statusAlerts.connectedDesc: Connected to your configured backend. Live sync is enabled.
statusAlerts.cloudUnavailableDesc: No Flask backend detected. Data stays on this device until a server URL is configured.

settings.enterFlaskUrl: Please enter a Flask backend URL

storage.cannotConnect: Cannot connect to Flask backend. Please check the URL and ensure the server is running.

migration.migratedToFlask: Successfully migrated {count} snippets to Flask backend
migration.failedToFlask: Failed to migrate data to Flask backend
migration.failedFromFlask: Failed to migrate data from Flask backend

database.cleared: Database cleared and schema recreated successfully
database.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This cannot be undone.

page.heading: My Snippets
page.subtitle: Save, organize, and share your code snippets

footer.tagline: Save, organize, and share your code snippets with beautiful syntax highlighting and live execution
footer.techNote: Supports React preview and multi-language Docker execution (Python, Java, Node.js, C++)

settingsPage.heading: Settings
settingsPage.subtitle: Manage your database and application settings

backendIndicator.disconnected: Disconnected from backend - Using local storage

errorFallback.title: This spark has encountered a runtime error

aiErrorHelper.dialogSubtitle: Let me help you understand and fix this error
aiErrorHelper.analysisError: Unable to analyze error. The AI service may be temporarily unavailable.

storage.title: Storage Backend
storage.description: Choose where your snippets are stored
storage.envVarAlertAfter: environment variable and cannot be changed here.
storage.indexedDBDesc: Store snippets locally in your browser. Data persists on this device only.
storage.flaskDesc: Store snippets on a Flask backend server. Data is accessible from any device.

stats.title: Database Statistics
stats.description: Information about your local database storage

actions.title: Database Actions
actions.description: Backup, restore, or reset your database
actions.exportDesc: Download your database as a file for backup or transfer to another device
actions.importDesc: Restore a previously exported database file
actions.seedDesc: Add sample code snippets to get started (only if database is empty)
actions.clearDesc: Permanently delete all snippets and templates. This cannot be undone.

schema.corruptedDesc: Your database schema is outdated or corrupted and needs to be repaired
schema.corruptedAlert: The database schema is missing required tables or columns (likely due to namespace feature addition). This can cause errors when loading or saving snippets. Click the button below to wipe and recreate the database with the correct schema.
schema.healthyDesc: Your database schema is up to date and functioning correctly

backendAuto.title: Backend Auto-Configured
backendAuto.description: Flask backend is configured via environment variable

storageInfo.title: Storage Information
storageInfo.indexedDBDesc: is being used for storage. This provides better performance and larger storage capacity compared to localStorage. Your data persists locally in your browser.
storageInfo.localStorageDesc: is being used for storage. IndexedDB is not available in your browser. Note that localStorage has a smaller storage limit (typically 5-10MB).
storageInfo.noneDesc: No persistent storage detected. Your data will be lost when you close the browser.

openAI.title: OpenAI API Settings
openAI.description: Configure your OpenAI API key for AI-powered error analysis. Your key is stored locally in your browser.
openAI.configuredStatus: ✓ API key is configured. Error analysis will use OpenAI GPT-4o-mini.
